column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a odzi kan no si ehyiadzibuw no ne ntamadan no."

column2: "Na fa ahyɛmudaka no si mu
column3: na fa ntwamutam no kata adaka no enyim."

column2: "Na fa ɔpon no kɔ mu
column3: na siesie ndzɛmba a wɔdze sisi do no; na fa kandzeadua no kɔ mu

column2: "Na fa sika eduhuamhyew afɔrmbukyia no kesi ahyɛmudaka no enyim
column3: na fa ntamadan no n'abowano nsensɛnho no sɛn."

column2: "Na fa ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no si ehyiadzibuw no ne ntamadan no n'abow enyim."
"Na fa eguarsɛn no si ehyiadzibuw no nye afɔrmbukyia no ntamu
column3: na fa nsu gu mu."

column2: "Na sisi dampan no hyia
column3: na fa dampan no n'abotsenano nsensɛnho no sɛn."

column2: "Na fa ɔserango no
column3: na fa sera ntamadan no
column6: ɔnye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara; na ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na sera ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no
column3: nye no ho ndzɛmba nyinara ngo
column4: na yɛ afɔrmbukyia no krɔnkrɔn: na afɔrmbukyia no nyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na sera eguarsɛn no nye ne ntaease no ngo
column3: na yɛ no krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Na fa Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no bra ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano
column3: na fa nsu hohor hɔn ho."

column2: "Na fa ntar krɔnkrɔn hyɛ Aaron; na sera no ngo
column3: na yɛ no krɔnkrɔn ma ondzi mo sɔfoe."

column2: "Na fa ne mbabanyin no bra
column3: na hyehyɛ hɔn sorntar:"

column2: "na sera hɔn ngo dɛ mbrɛ eseraa hɔn egya ngo no
column3: ma wondzi m'asɔfoe: na hɔn sera no nyɛ hɔn daadaa asɔfodzi nkɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina mu."

column2: "Dɛm na Moses yɛe: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no nyinara."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia ebien no mu bosoom a odzi kan no mu
column3: da a odzi bosoom no ne kan no

column2: "Na Moses sii ntamadan no
column3: na ɔhyehyɛɛ ne ngyinangyinado no
column5: na ɔdze ne mbeabeamu no beabeaa mu

column2: "Na ɔtserɛɛw buw no mu kataa ntamadan no do
column3: na ɔdze ɔsor buw no ne nkatado no kataa do; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ɔfaa dase no dze hyɛɛ adaka no
column3: na ɔdze mpoma no hyehyɛɛ adaka no ho
column4: na ɔdze mbɔbɔrhu egua no sii adaka no do ɔsor;"

column2: "na ɔdze adaka no kɔr ntamadan no mu
column3: na ɔdze nsensɛnho ntwamutam no sensɛnee
column4: na ɔdze kataa ahyɛmudaka no enyim; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔpon no sii ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: wɔ ntamadan no nkyɛn mu kwaamu afamu

column2: "Na osiesiee edziban no wɔ do wɔ EWURADZE enyim; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Na ɔdze kandzeadua no sii ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: wɔ ɔpon no tsentsendo
column4: wɔ ntamadan no nkyɛn mu pomu afamu."

column2: "Na ɔsosɔɔ nkandzea no wɔ EWURADZE enyim; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Na ɔdze sika afɔrmbukyia no sii ehyiadzibuw no mu wɔ ntwamutam no enyim:"
"na ɔhyeew nduhuam wɔ do; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
"Na ɔdze nsensɛnho no sɛɛn ntamadan no n'abow no ano."
"Na ɔdze ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no sii ehyiadzibuw ntamadan no n'abow no ano
column3: na ɔbɔɔ do ɔhyew afɔr nye edziban afɔr; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na ɔdze eguarsɛn no sii ehyiadzibuw no nye afɔrmbukyia no ntamu
column3: na ɔdze nsu guu mu dɛ wɔmfa nhohor hɔnho."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no hohoor hɔn nsa ho nye hɔn anan ho wɔ hɔ;"
"aber a wɔrokɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: na aber a wɔrebɛbɛn afɔrmbukyia no
column4: wɔhohoor hɔnho: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na osii dampan no dze twaa ntamadan no nye afɔrmbukyia no ho hyiae
column3: na ɔdze dampan no n'abotsenano nsensɛnho no sɛnee. Nna Moses wiee edwuma no yɛ."

column2: "Nna mununkum no bɛkataa ehyiadzibuw no do
column3: na EWURADZE enyimnyam bɛhyɛɛ ntamadan no ma."

column2: "Na Moses enntum annhɛn ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: osian mununkum no a ɔtse do
column4: na EWURADZE enyimnyam a ahyɛ ntamadan no ma ntsi."

column2: "Na aber a wɔama mununkum no do wɔ ntamadan no do no
column3: nna Israelmba etu kɔ kan
column4: wɔ hɔn akwantutu no nyina mu;"

column2: "na sɛ mununkum no wɔamma do a
column3: ɔnodze wonntu kwan araa kodur da a wɔama do no."

column2: "Osiandɛ EWURADZE no mununkum no wɔ ntamadan no do adzekyee
column3: na ogya wɔ mu adzesaa
column4: wɔ Israel fi no nyinara enyim
column5: wɔ hɔn akwantutu no nyina mu."
